page.title: 10ECONOMICS
page.content: For a small town,there are many banks and building societies.Most large banks and building societies have branches in Conwy. Jobs around Conwy can be split up into two catagories:-Services and Manufacturing. Sevices deals with tousists and shops.There are many gift shops in Conwy as Tourists are a main source of income. Residents in Conwy travel outside Conwy to work in factories in Llandudno and Llandudno Junction. There is a small fishing business in Conwy but it only supplies fish to a few local shops and restaurants. By Warren Hughes
